00022 BURST_LOCATIONS               gsBurstLocations[ MAX_BURST_LOCATIONS ];
00023 INT8                          gbNumBurstLocations = 0;

00025 extern BOOLEAN gfBeginBurstSpreadTracking;

00028 void ResetBurstLocations( )
00029 {
00030       gbNumBurstLocations = 0;
00031 }

00034 void InternalAccumulateBurstLocation( INT16 sGridNo )
00035 {
00036       INT32 cnt;
00037       if ( gbNumBurstLocations < MAX_BURST_LOCATIONS )
00038       {
00039             // Check if it already exists!
00040             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gbNumBurstLocations; cnt++ )
00041             {
00042                   if ( gsBurstLocations[ cnt ].sGridNo == sGridNo )
00043                   {
00044                         return;
00045                   }
00046             }
00047 
00048             gsBurstLocations[ gbNumBurstLocations ].sGridNo = sGridNo;
00049 
00050             // Get cell X, Y from mouse...
00051             GetMouseWorldCoords( &( gsBurstLocations[ gbNumBurstLocations ].sX ), &( gsBurstLocations[ gbNumBurstLocations ].sY ) );
00052 
00053             gbNumBurstLocations++;
00054       }
00055 }
00056 
00057 //Madd: to add a bit more usefulness to spread fire, I'm making it so that 
00058 //it will automatically latch onto enemies within iSearchRange tiles of the mouse drag.
00059 void AccumulateBurstLocation( INT16 sGridNo )
00060 {
00061       SOLDIERTYPE* pTarget;
00062       int iSearchRange = 2; // number of tiles beside the mouse drag to look at
00063       INT16 sMaxLeft, sMaxRight, sMaxUp, sMaxDown, sXOffset, sYOffset, sAdjacentGridNo;
00064       BOOLEAN foundTarget = FALSE;
00065 
00066             //first see if we can find a guy standing right on the spot
00067             pTarget = SimpleFindSoldier(sGridNo,0);
00068             if (!pTarget)
00069                   pTarget = SimpleFindSoldier(sGridNo, 1); //try on a roof
00070 
00071             if (pTarget)
00072             {
00073                   InternalAccumulateBurstLocation(sGridNo);             
00074                   foundTarget = TRUE;     
00075             }
00076             //let's now look around this square - maybe there are some adjacent enemies we can latch onto
00077 
00078             // stay away from the edges
00079 
00080             // determine maximum horizontal limits
00081             sMaxLeft  = min( iSearchRange, (sGridNo % MAXCOL));
00082             sMaxRight = min( iSearchRange, MAXCOL - ((sGridNo % MAXCOL) + 1));
00083 
00084             // determine maximum vertical limits
00085             sMaxUp   = min( iSearchRange, (sGridNo / MAXROW));
00086             sMaxDown = min( iSearchRange, MAXROW - ((sGridNo / MAXROW) + 1));
00087 
00088             // reset the "reachable" flags in the region we're looking at
00089             for (sYOffset = -sMaxUp; sYOffset <= sMaxDown; sYOffset++)
00090             {
00091                   for (sXOffset = -sMaxLeft; sXOffset <= sMaxRight; sXOffset++)
00092                   {
00093                         sAdjacentGridNo = sGridNo + sXOffset + (MAXCOL * sYOffset);
00094                         if ( !(sAdjacentGridNo >=0 && sAdjacentGridNo < WORLD_MAX) )
00095                         {
00096                               continue;
00097                         }
00098 
00099                         pTarget = SimpleFindSoldier(sAdjacentGridNo,0); // look for a guy in that gridno
00100 
00101                         if (!pTarget)
00102                               pTarget = SimpleFindSoldier(sAdjacentGridNo, 1); //try on a roof
00103 
00104                         if (pTarget)
00105                         {           
00106                               InternalAccumulateBurstLocation(sAdjacentGridNo); //there's somebody there! let's latch onto him
00107                               foundTarget = TRUE;     
00108                         }
00109                   }
00110             }
00111 
00112 
00113             if ( !foundTarget )
00114             {
00115                   //didn't find anyone nearby, but we should target this space anyway to prevent players from abusing this feature
00116                   InternalAccumulateBurstLocation(sGridNo);
00117             }
00118 }

00121 void PickBurstLocations( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00122 {
00123       UINT8       ubShotsPerBurst;
00124       FLOAT       dAccululator = 0;
00125       FLOAT       dStep = 0;
00126       INT32       cnt;
00127       UINT8       ubLocationNum;
00128 
00129       // OK, using the # of locations, spread them evenly between our current weapon shots per burst value
00130 
00131       // Get shots per burst
00132       //DIGICRAB: Burst UnCap
00133       //if we fire more than MAX_BURST_SPREAD_TARGETS bullets, make sure there's no buffer overflow
00134       if(pSoldier->bDoAutofire)
00135       {
00136             INT16 sAPCosts;
00137 
00138             if ( pSoldier->bDoAutofire <= gbNumBurstLocations )
00139             {
00140                   pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 1;
00141                   do
00142                   {
00143                         pSoldier->bDoAutofire++;
00144                         sAPCosts = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, gsBurstLocations[0].sGridNo, TRUE, 0);
00145                   }
00146                   while(EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCosts, 0, FALSE ) && pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunShotsLeft >= pSoldier->bDoAutofire && gbNumBurstLocations >= pSoldier->bDoAutofire);
00147                   pSoldier->bDoAutofire--;
00148 
00149                   ubShotsPerBurst = __min(pSoldier->bDoAutofire,MAX_BURST_SPREAD_TARGETS);
00150             }
00151             else if ( gbNumBurstLocations > 0 )
00152                   ubShotsPerBurst = pSoldier->bDoAutofire / gbNumBurstLocations;
00153 
00154       }
00155       else
00156       {
00157             if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST )
00158                   ubShotsPerBurst = __min(Weapon[GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(&pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS])].ubShotsPerBurst,MAX_BURST_SPREAD_TARGETS);      
00159             else
00160                   ubShotsPerBurst = __min(GetShotsPerBurst(&pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]),MAX_BURST_SPREAD_TARGETS);
00161       }
00162 
00163       // Use # gridnos accululated and # burst shots to determine accululator
00164       dStep = gbNumBurstLocations / (FLOAT)ubShotsPerBurst;
00165 
00166       //Loop through our shots!
00167       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ubShotsPerBurst; cnt++ )
00168       {
00169             // Get index into list
00170             ubLocationNum = (UINT8)( dAccululator );
00171 
00172             // Add to merc location
00173             pSoldier->sSpreadLocations[ cnt ] = gsBurstLocations[ ubLocationNum ].sGridNo;
00174             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("PickBurstLocations: loc#%d = %d", cnt, pSoldier->sSpreadLocations[ cnt ]));
00175             // Acculuate index value
00176             dAccululator += dStep;
00177       }
00178 
00179       // OK, they have been added
00180 }
00181 
00182 void AIPickBurstLocations( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bTargets, SOLDIERTYPE *pTargets[5] )
00183 {
00184       UINT8       ubShotsPerBurst;
00185       FLOAT       dAccululator = 0;
00186       FLOAT       dStep = 0;
00187       INT32       cnt;
00188       UINT8       ubLocationNum;
00189 
00190       // OK, using the # of locations, spread them evenly between our current weapon shots per burst value
00191 
00192       // Get shots per burst
00193       //DIGICRAB: Burst UnCap
00194       //if we fire more than MAX_BURST_SPREAD_TARGETS bullets, make sure there's no buffer overflow
00195       if(pSoldier->bDoAutofire)
00196             ubShotsPerBurst = __min(pSoldier->bDoAutofire,MAX_BURST_SPREAD_TARGETS);
00197       else
00198             ubShotsPerBurst = __min(GetShotsPerBurst (&pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]),MAX_BURST_SPREAD_TARGETS);
00199 
00200       if ( ubShotsPerBurst <= 0 )
00201             ubShotsPerBurst = 1;
00202 
00203       // Use # gridnos accululated and # burst shots to determine accululator
00204       //dStep = gbNumBurstLocations / (FLOAT)ubShotsPerBurst;
00205       // CJC: tweak!
00206       dStep = bTargets / (FLOAT)ubShotsPerBurst;
00207 
00208       //Loop through our shots!
00209       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ubShotsPerBurst; cnt++ )
00210       {
00211             // Get index into list
00212             ubLocationNum = (UINT8)( dAccululator );
00213 
00214             // Add to merc location
00215             pSoldier->sSpreadLocations[ cnt ] = pTargets[ubLocationNum]->sGridNo;
00216 
00217             // Acculuate index value
00218             dAccululator += dStep;
00219       }
00220 
00221       // OK, they have been added
00222 }

00228 void RenderAccumulatedBurstLocations( )
00229 {
00230       INT32             cnt;
00231       INT16             sGridNo;
00232       HVOBJECT    hVObject;
00233 
00234       if ( !gfBeginBurstSpreadTracking )
00235       {
00236             return;
00237       }
00238 
00239       if ( gbNumBurstLocations == 0 )
00240       {
00241             return;
00242       }
00243 
00244       // Loop through each location...
00245       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiBURSTACCUM );
00246 
00247       // If on screen, render
00248 
00249       // Check if it already exists!
00250       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gbNumBurstLocations; cnt++ )
00251       {
00252             sGridNo = gsBurstLocations[ cnt ].sGridNo;
00253 
00254             if ( GridNoOnScreen( sGridNo ) )
00255             {
00256                   FLOAT                   dOffsetX, dOffsetY;
00257                   FLOAT                   dTempX_S, dTempY_S;
00258                   INT16                   sXPos, sYPos;
00259                   INT32                   iBack;
00260 
00261                   dOffsetX = (FLOAT)( gsBurstLocations[ cnt ].sX - gsRenderCenterX );
00262                   dOffsetY = (FLOAT)( gsBurstLocations[ cnt ].sY - gsRenderCenterY );
00263 
00264                   // Calculate guy's position
00265                   FloatFromCellToScreenCoordinates( dOffsetX, dOffsetY, &dTempX_S, &dTempY_S );
00266 
00267                   sXPos = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2 ) + (INT16)dTempX_S;
00268                   sYPos = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2 ) + (INT16)dTempY_S - gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].sHeight;
00269 
00270                   // Adjust for offset position on screen
00271                   sXPos -= gsRenderWorldOffsetX;
00272                   sYPos -= gsRenderWorldOffsetY;
00273 
00274                   // Adjust for render height
00275                   sYPos += gsRenderHeight;
00276 
00277                   //sScreenY -= gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].sHeight;
00278 
00279                   // Center circle!
00280                   //sXPos -= 10;
00281                   //sYPos -= 10;
00282 
00283                   iBack = RegisterBackgroundRect( BGND_FLAG_SINGLE, NULL, sXPos, sYPos, (INT16)(sXPos +40 ), (INT16)(sYPos + 40 ) ); 
00284                   if ( iBack != -1 )
00285                   {
00286                         SetBackgroundRectFilled( iBack );
00287                   }
00288 
00289                   BltVideoObject(  FRAME_BUFFER, hVObject, 1, sXPos, sYPos, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00290             }
00291       }
00292 }
